nodeList.altText: Maelstrom itself cannot stun, as it is a Damage Over Time Spell.
nodeList.description: Each stack of Maelstrom grants you an increased chance to stun enemies.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Each stack of Maelstrom grants [15%] global increased stun chance per point.

As Maelstrom is Damage Over Time it still cannot stun.

node.description:
Maelstrom's base cold damage is converted to physical. Consequently this damage scales with increases to physical damage, but not increases to cold damage.

Chill chance from this tree is converted to slow chance.

Maelstrom can no longer freeze, but each stack of Maelstrom grants increased physical damage.
node.nodeDescription:
Converts Maelstroms base damage to physical.

Each stack of Maelstrom grants 5% increased global physical damage.

Maelstrom can no longer freeze. Chill chance from this tree is converted to slow chance.

nodeList.description:
When your number of Maelstrom stacks reaches 0, you have a chance to summon 2 to 4 {Twisters,} a spell that deals cold damage to enemies hit. 

The number of Twisters is random, and the chance to summon them is multiplied by the highest number of stacks you reached.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
When your number of Maelstrom stacks reaches 0, you have [10%] chance per point to summon 2 to 4 Twisters (number is random).


The chance is multiplied by the highest number of stacks you've reached.
